select si.id, si.staff_id, si.station_name, si.check_type, si.check_date, si.content, si.images, wi.name, wi.image as staffImages, wi.phone from safety_inspection si left join worker_info wi on (wi.id = si.staff_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.station_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{safetyInspection.stationName},'%')
AND wi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{safetyInspection.staffName},'%')
AND si.check_type = #{safetyInspection.checkType}
order by si.check_date desc
